title: Question about recovered account
body:
My account was recently stolen and subjected to fraudulent activity. The user transferred my account to EUW and changed the summoner name. While we are still working out the charges on my card I was able to log into my account and change the passwords on everything and get it transferred back to NA. If I LOLking the name that the hacker changed it to on EUW the profile appears with the match history (same exact matches that appear on my match history when I log in on NA). My question is will this user be deleted & is there any way that this user will be punished?

Edit* also if you look at my match history it still has the hackers name - will I get my original summoner name back?

replies.body:
We can't help out with this sort of thing here on H&S, since we'll need to take a deep look at your account. If you reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll get you in touch with a recovery specialist who can help you sort your account out.

Let me know if you have any issues submitting your ticket.

I currently have two tickets open, one when I thought my account was transferring due to a bug & then one from the next day when I saw that I had charges to my bank account from riot meaning it wasn't a bug and someone hacked me. I'm awaiting a response on both of the tickets atm but I am being helped for sure!

I was just curious in this thread if I am going to have my original summoner name back and if there is really anything we can do about the person who hacked it. If you can't answer that here that's totally cool, I'm just pretty anxious waiting for responses - but I know you guys are busy so it's understandable.
